UD_ModTrigger_DeviceEvent
Scriptname UD_ModTrigger_DeviceEvent extends UD_ModTrigger

It triggers on device event(s)

NameFull: On Device Event

Parameters in DataStr

[0]  String  Device event to trigger (one or several abbreviations separated by space) DL - Device locked DU - Device unlocked DB - Device broken

[1]  Float  Base probability to trigger on event (in %) Default value: 100.0%

Example

DL,100  It triggers when device is locked

Events Processing
User interface
Protected Methods
